Entities.Name: Problem
Entities.Definition: Medical problems or conditions mentioned in the clinical text.

Entities.Name: Test
Entities.Definition: Clinical or diagnostic tests performed on the patient.

Entities.Name: Treatment
Entities.Definition: Therapeutic procedures or medications administered to treat a medical condition.
Entities.SampleData: He was given [Lasix] periodically to prevent him from going into congestive heart failure.

Dataset.Name: 2010 i2b2/VA Challenge Corpus
Dataset.Description: Annotated corpus of clinical discharge summaries and progress notes used in the i2b2/VA 2010 challenge.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Concepts were annotated as Problems, Tests, or Treatments. Assertions were assigned to Problems based on context (e.g., negation, temporality, subject). Relations between concepts were assigned based on co-occurrence in a sentence and contextual language. Guidelines were provided to annotators and are publicly available.
